name: DotCover Analyse
description: The task creates and runs the Resharper DotCover analyse command line
author: Christopher Pateman

inputs.name: TargetExecutable
inputs.label: Target Executable
inputs.helpMarkDown: File name of the program to analyse

inputs.name: TargetArguments
inputs.label: Target Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Program arguments. If contains * then will be used as a wildcard to search the Target Working Directory.

inputs.name: ProjectPattern
inputs.label: Project Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this to search the Target Wroking Directory for all file in a pattern

inputs.name: TempDir
inputs.label: Temp Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory for auxiliary files. Set to the system temp by default

inputs.name: ReportType
inputs.label: Report Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: A type of the report. XML by default

inputs.name: Output
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resulting report file path and name. Default path is the Target Working Directory and default name is 'CodeAnalyseResults'.

inputs.name: InheritConsole
inputs.label: Inherit Console
inputs.helpMarkDown: Lets the analysed application to inherit dotCover console. True by default. Please note that windows of the analysed GUI application will not be hidden if the console is inherited

inputs.name: AnalyseTargetArguments
inputs.label: Analyse Target Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether dotCover should analyse the 'target arguments' string and convert relative paths to absolute ones. True by default

inputs.name: Scope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows including assemblies that were not loaded in the specified scope into coverage results. The parameter is a semicolon separated list of file path masks.

inputs.name: Filters
inputs.label: Filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies coverage filters using the following syntax: +:module=*;class=*;function=*;Use -:myassembly to exclude an assembly from code coverage.

inputs.name: AttributeFilters
inputs.label: Attribute Filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies attribute filters using the following syntax: filter1;filter2;... Asterisk wildcard (*) is supported here

inputs.name: SymbolSearchPaths
inputs.label: Symbol Search Paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies additional symbol search paths. Paths to symbol servers (starting with srv* prefix) are supported here. Values are separated with semicolon

inputs.name: AllowSymbolServerAccess
inputs.label: Allow Symbol Server Access
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows dotCover to search for PDB files on a symbol server

inputs.name: ReturnTargetExitCode
inputs.label: Return Target Exit Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Returns the exit code of the target executable in case coverage analysis succeeded

inputs.name: LogFile
inputs.label: Log File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables logging and specifies log file name
